articles.title: Cracker Jack launches ‘Cracker Jill’ to honor women in sports - NJ.com
articles.description: The popular ballpark snack Cracker Jack is getting new mascots called "Cracker Jill"
articles.content:
Cracker Jack is changing its lineup to make way for Cracker Jill, the brands latest mascots in its 125-year history and a way to honor women in sports.
